mapper.sql: id, robot_name, avatar, sex, concern_num, fans_num, condition_num, store_num, rank_no, status, create_time, update_time,uid,uname,nname,phone,levels_id

and status = 1
and robot_name like '%${robotName}%'
and nname like '%${nname}%'
and sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(1) from b_urs where status = 1
select uid from b_urs where status = 1 limit #{long},1
mapper.insert:

robot_name = #{robotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nname = #{nname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
